page.title: 08A child's day in Bacup
page.content: I am a girl. On Monday morning when I awake I read for a while. When I get up I have a breakfast of cereal and a drink. Then I get dressed,brush my teeth and hair and collect my dinner money and lunch snack. I go with my brother and sister but call for my friend on the way. Before we go into school at 9o'clock we play marbles. When we go in we have assembly then go to class for religion,maths and English lessons. We have a short break in the morning and afternoon and a long one for dinner. For dinner we have a choice of A or B menu.It is different each day. In the afternoon we have lessons again and at 3_30pm mum comes to collect us. At home I have an ice lolly made from fruit juice,watch television,have tea and go to bed around 9pm. I read before I go to sleep every night.
